item.title: Research visit - Odense, Denmark
item.description: Research visit to the University of Southern Denmark (SDU); visited the UAS Center and gave a seminar on swarm drones for agriculture.

item.title: IAS 19 Conference - Genoa, Italy
item.description: Presented during the Special Session on Field Robotics empowered by AI.

item.title: IEEE RAS Summer School on MRS - Prague
item.description: Attended Summer School on Multi-Robot Systems focused on autonomous drone coordination.
